sentence: Kube nokwehla okukhulu kwesibalo sabahlonga-kalako hlangana nelutjha.Kuye kwakghonakala ukwehlisa isibalo sabahlongakalako ngo-mbana thina, nabatjhebisani bethu, sisabalalise ihlelo lemi-tjhoga elinatjisiweko elifikeleleeengidini zabantu abanobulwelo-bu.Ekuthomeni kwetjhumi lemi -nyaka, ihlelo lethu elikhandela ukuthelelana nge-HIV ukusuka kumma ukuya emntwaneniongakabelethwa (i-PMTCT) akhange kuyelelwe ngefanelo.

sentence: Ungezelele ngokuthi Iphrojekthi le iyingcenye yomTlamo wokuThuthukiswa kweliZweloke (i-NDP) wee-2030 neQhinga eliKhulu lokulawula iinThuthi leliZweloke lomnyaka wee-2050 elisekela iHlelo lokwAkha kabuTjha nokuVuselela umNotho (i-ERRP).Ukufikela gadesi urhulumende unqophe ukuThuthukisa ihlelo leenthuthi elikhambisana neendingo zamambala zabantu beSewula Afrika nokutjheja abantu abanganamali eyaneleko lokha nabanama khambo.U-Matekane uthi ukuvuselela lokhu kuzokuthatha iminyaka ebunane ukuya kelitjhumi godu bazokuzama ukuthi ukuvalwa kweendlela kungabi ngokuphazamisa amakhambo khulu.

sentence: Wadinywa isithunzi sobuntu, ekumgomo onzinze ekutjhotjhozeleni kwakhe ukuzikhakhazisa kwabanzima ngombalabo.Ngokutjho kwegcwetha lomndeni, u-Sir Sydney Kentridge, “ukuhlongakala kwakhe kwaba ngokomuntu olahliweko nonganabani arabhalele emedzeni nefluru yamatje ngemaseleni”.Kuhlala kungunoba ngela wamatlhuwo nalokha sekuminyaka kwenzeka, nasicabanga ukuthi uSteve Biko bekaneminyaka ema-30 kwaphela nakahlongakalako.
label: nbl

sentence: Ipilwakhe yaqinteliswa msinynana lokha nakathoma ukuba sesiqongolweni sayo, ipheliswa ngilabo ababesaba amandla nomthelela wemikhumbulo yakhe mayelana nokuzitjhaphulula kunye nemizamo yakhe yokutjala ukuzikhakhazisa nokuba nesithunzi kibobaba nabomma abanzima.Akhange aphile bekabone lokho abekakubiza ‘ngonongorwana orhanya zelako’, ukufikelelwa kobuntu bamambala.
label: nbl

sentence: Nakatlola ngomkhumbu lwakhe, wakhuluma amezwi abanendumela nakathi: “Ngesikhathi esifaneleko sizakuba sebujameni boku thwesa iSewula Afrika isipho esikhulu khulu – ubuso obubonakalako.”Lokha nasithumba ikululeko yethu ngomnyaka we-1994, sazwisisa ukuthi ilungelo lokukhetha laliyi ngcenye yomzabalazo wethu wesithunzi sabantu.Eminyakeni ematjhumi amabili yentando yenengi yethu, sisaqalene neense lele ezifana nomtlhago, ukutlhayela kwemisebenzi nokungalingani ngokomnotho.
label: nbl

sentence: Ngaleso sizathu vane silibale ibanga esilikhambileko ekuphumeleliseni imigomo esisekelo somthethosisekelo welizwe lekhethu ekungiwo oyisika yemikhumbulo neemfundiso zika-Steve Biko.Ngomnyaka we-1977, umbuso welunya wabulala omunye wabarholi abaveleleko nabathembisako ngelizweni ngokumdima ukugoma, amanzi nokwela tjhwa abekakutlhoga khulu ngemva kokudendebulwa mapholisa wombuso weba ndlululo.Ngemva kweminyaka ema tjhumi amabili, esahlulelweni somnyaka we-1997, iKhotho yomThethosisekelo yathi ukuzaliselela amalungelo asisekelo wazo zoke izakhamuzi nokulwela ukufikelela amalungelo wezehlalakuhle newomnotho kulitshwayo eliqakathekileko lomphakathi wentando yenengi lokha nakubuyiswa isithunzi esilahlekileko.Namhlanjesi eSewula Afrika, siyaraga nokusebenzela ukuphumelelisa amalungelo asisekelo wamaSewula Afrika woke ukuze baphile ipilo enganamalwele, enganandlala nokudinywa amathuba.Imibuso yentando yenengi esele ibuse amahlandla alandelanako yethule imithethomgomo yokuvuselela isithunzi senengi esalahlekako ngelizweni ngokuletha ifundo, isizo lezepilo ehle, iinkumba nezenzelwa ezisisekelo.NgeSewula Afrika namhla njesi, ifundo enetlha ililunge lo elisisekelo.
label: nbl

sentence: Umbuso usisa khulu efundweni yabasathomako ekusekeleni imiphumela yefundo yezakhamuzi zethu ezisakhulako ukuze zifikelele imiphumela emihle ngokukghonakalako.Ngesizo lesiKhwama seSizo leeMali kubaFundi seliZweloke (i-NSFAS) nezinye iindlela ezihlukileko zesekelo lombuso, iinkulungwana zelutjha lamaSewula Afrika, zibuya emindenini enganabuyo, ziphumelele ukuba bodorhodere, amagcwetha, abotitjhere, abososayensi, bemisebenzi yamakghono nabosomabhizinisi.Urhulumende usekela izakhamuzi ezitlhagako nezinganabuyo ngehlelo leembonelelo zezehlalakuhle nokuvula amathuba wemisebenzi ngamahlelo wombuso aqatjha imiphakathi.KileyaSewula Afrika u-Steve Biko ahlongakalela kiyo, ukukhuluma ngoku tjhaphuluka bekumphambo begodu namajima wezepolotiki bekangunobangela wokubotjhwa namkha oku ngaphezulu kwalokho.ESewula Afrika namhla njesi, abantu abatjha abalingana no-Steve Biko nabangaphasi ngeminyaka bakhamba phambili ngamajima wokutjhotjhozela abakholelwa kikho begodu bayakghona ukuhloma iinhlangano ngaphandle kokutshwenywa ngemithetho yokuvalwa umlomo.
label: nbl

sentence: Ikululeko yokukhuluma nokuhlanganyela, ilungelo lokutjhagala nelokulingana phambi komthetho lingelomuntu woke.Njengelizwe, sesikhambe ibanga elide ekufikeleleni isithunzi sobuntu, okumgomo u-Steve Biko egade awu thanda nanyana sisese nebanga elide ekumele silikhambe.Ngaphandle komsebenzi, ngaphandle kweenkumba, igezi namanzi, ngaphandle kwenarha, ngaphandle kwamakghono namkha amathuba, iingidigidi zamaSewula Afrika zisadinywe ubujamo bepilo eziyifisako nefaneleko.
label: nbl

sentence: Kungebangelo urhulumende asebenzisana nababambisani ukwakha umnotho ohlanga nyelweko, ukuvula imi sebenzi, ukukghonakalisa amabhizinisi ukuthi aphumelele nokulwa nomtlhago nendlala.Nakutjhejwa ukukhambe lana kwepilo ka-Steve Biko nelifa alitjhiyako, sikhumbula isibawo sakhe esinamandla ebantwini ukuthi babe batlami bekululeko yabo.

sentence: Abomma abasebantwini banesibopho sokungaseli ngombana utjwala bungabangela ubulwele obukhandela ukukhula komntwana.Ikulumo le idenjwe liSekela likaNgqongqotjhe wezokuThuthukiswa kweHlalakuhle yomPhakathi, u-Hendrietta Bogopane-Zulu, ohlome mhlapha Ijima lokuyelelisa ngokuLimala komBungu okubangelwa buTjwala i-9-9-9 Foetal Alcohol Spectrum Disorder (i-FASD).Umnqopho wejimeli kukhuthaza imiphakathi ukusiza ngokuvikela abentwana abangakabukubelethwa ngokufundisa abantu, khulukhulu abomma abase-seminyakeni yokubeletha, mayelana nengozi yokusela utjwala lokha nabasidisi namkha nabamunyisako.“Kuqakathekile kibo boke abomma abasebantwini nalabo abafuna ukubeletha abentwana abaphile kuhle ukuthi bazile utjwala.

sentence: Ingozi ebangelwa yi-FASD ingeyasafuthi okutjho bona ayilungiseki begodu abentwana ababelethwa nobujamobu baba nemiraro ngokwesakhiwo nemkhumbulweni wabo,” kwatjho iSekela likaNgqongqotjhe u-Bogopane-Zulu nagade kuhlonywa ijimeli.Wangezelela ngokuthi iSewula Afrika iyaziwa ngomraro wokusela utjwala, lapho ibalwa hlangana namazwe anobujamo obuthu-weleleko ephasini ngezinga lokusela utjwala.ISekela likaNgqongqotjhe u-Bogopane-Zulu mhlapha bekavakatjhele iindawo ezihlukahlukeneko nge-lizweni, ayokufundisa abomma ngengozi yokusela utjwala lokha nabasebantwini njengengcenye yejima i-9-9-9 FASD.Nagade ase-Boitekong e-Rustenburg eseTlhagwini Tjingalanga, utjele abahlali ukuthi amazinga wokusela utjwala butjhwileni elokitjhi-nela ayathusa.Umuntu wengubo oneenyanga ezine asebantwini nosisakhamuzi se-Boitekong, u-Basetsana Tlalang (oneminyaka ema-28), ogade akhona kelinye lamajima la, uthe walisa ukusela utjwala nake-zwa ukuthi usebantwini godu wathi ufumana itjhejo labantu abasebantwini godu ufumana nokwelulekwa emtholapilo.

sentence: Ematjhumini weminyaka adluleko abantu abatjha badose phambili imizabalazo balwisana noku-dinywa kobulungiswa, ukusu-kela emtjhagalweni wabafundi be-Paris ngomnyaka we-1968, ukuya egadangweni lehlanga-no eyayilwisana nepi yephasi e-United States ngeminyaka ye-1960, ukuﬁ kela emzabala-zweni owawulwisana nega-ndelelo yokumukwa inarha emazweni amanengi we-Afri-ka newe-Asia, ukuﬁ kela epini eyalwisana nebandlululo, ku-fakwa hlangana imiguruguru yamhlapha yokulwisana ne-gandelelo lombuso nobujamo obungasibuhle bepilo ema-zweni wama-Arabhu, i-Arab Spring.Mhlaphanje, ilutjha gade lidosa phambili ijima le-#BlackLivesMatter (iPilo yaba-Nzima iQakathekile) esele lizuze isekelo lephasiloke mayelana nesenzo samhlapha sokubulawa kuka-George Floyd lipholisa le-United Sta-tes.Eemvekeni ezidlulileko, aba-tjhotjhozeli gade balwela bona kususwe ngekani iinthombe-matshwayo ezibuka ikambiso yelunya yokurhwebelana ngamakhoboka neyegandelelo lokwemukwa inarha.

sentence: Bagiriza iinthombe namatshwayo amumethe ukunina ngoko-butjhaba, bafuna kupheliswe ihlelo lefundo enegandelelo, nokwenza isimemezelo soko-bana amaziko wezefundo aqa-lane nomraro wokukhethulula ngokobutjhaba nokungaba-ndakanywa kwesitjhaba soke ngokupheleleko.Ngalokho-ke, sithatha umzuzu lo sihloniphe isi-zukulwani sangomnyaka we-1976, namhlanje nakali-16 kuMgwengweni wee-2020, sethulela ingwani ilutjha leSewula Afrika elilama isi-khathi sebandlululo, aba-ninilifa abafanelwe kuzuza kileligugu eliqakathekileko nesizikhakhazisa ngalo.Umsebenzi welutjha lomnya-ka we-1976 kwakukuphelisa ihlelo lefundo yabantu abanzi-ma (i-Bantu Education); kobana ilutjha lanamhlanjesi liragele phambili nephrojekthi yoku-buyisana neyokuletha ama-tjhuguluko welizweloke.

sentence: Esikhathini esiminyaka eza-ko kuzakuthiwa ngalomnyaka wee-2020, kwaba kuthoma kwesikhathi somlando omu-tjha wabantu.Akhange kwaphela ingo-gwana ye-corona ibe nomthe-lela omumbi emaphilweni wabantu kodwana nengeni-so yabo yakhinyabezeka, ya-buye yakhahlameza nendle-la ebegade kwenziwa ngayo izinto ephasini loke.Indlela umbulalazwe lo obambe iphasi ngobhongwana ngakho, kube sikhumbuzo sokobana ekugcineni soke sibabantu abaphila ngoku-bambisana nokungalingani okungeneleleko okuphakathi kwamazwe nokungaphakathi kwelizwe lethu.Umbulalazwe lo unikela nge-thuba lokulungisa kabutjha ikambiso lapho umuntu nga-munye aziwa ngokwezinga lokunotha kwakhe, azicaba-ngela bekazitjheje yena yedwa kodwana lokhu akuthinti abantu ngamunye kwaphela kodwana kufaka hlangana amazwe jikele.Abantu abatjha basitjela bonyana ifundiso eqakatheki-leko, izwelo nobunye kufuze kube matshwayo anzinzileko womphakathi omutjha osazo-kuba khona, nokobana bazi-misele ukuba badosiphambili bephaseli elitjha, elingcono.Emikhulumiswaneni engikhe ngaba nayo nelutjha ngithe asikafaneli ukuqalela phasi amandla womkhumbulo, ngombana imikhumbulo inga-tjhugulula kanti seyikhe ya-tjhugulua iphasi.
